dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Eleven!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: . ODA MAE'S LIVINGROOM - NIGHT Oda Mae is watching T.V. with Clara and Louise. Suddenly she jumps, aware of Sam's presence in the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clara and Louise jump, too.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sam!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not again!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What're you doin' here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oda Mae! We're in trouble. They want the check. They're comin' to kill you. We gotta get outta here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: The check? What do you mean, "the check". You said they'd never find out.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (afraid) What's happenin' Oda Mae?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A red Mustang SCREECHES to a stop on the street below. Sam and Oda Mae run to the window. Carl and Willie are looking up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's them.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They're comin' to kill me. (to Sam, crazed) What have you done?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Willie and Carl jump out of the car. They head for Oda Mae's building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam steps back from the window.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They're heading for the door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (terrified) Jesus have mercy.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Willie forces open a back door. They head into the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae and the others hurry into the hall. They rush down the corridor and knock loudly on a neighbor's door. A WOMAN opens it a crack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Woman slams the door and locks it shut. Oda Mae looks frightened.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Emergency! Let us in!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who you kiddin'?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Carl and Willie climb the stairs two at a time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae and her sisters bang on another apartment door. No one is home. Across the corridor an ELDERLY WOMAN sticks her head out to see what is going on. Before she can say anything they push their way inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae grabs the woman's mouth.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: What're you doin'? You can't come in here. The cat don't like visitors. She'll pee all over the couch. You wanna pay for...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: just as Willie and Carl emerge from the stairwell. They head down the hall toward Oda Mae's door. Willie pulls out a gun, and fires. The lock shoots open. They rush inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: in the elderly woman's vestibule, peering through the peephole. The old woman is struggling and still trying to talk. Oda Mae's knees are wobbling.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: They're gonna find us.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No they won't. I'm gonna get 'em.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh yeah? And how you gonna do that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Whataya mean? I'm a ghost, aren't I?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Willie moves quickly through Oda Mae's apartment, his gun pointed, ready to fire. He seems furious when he realizes no one is there.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Looks like someone just left.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'll check the building.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: He rushes back out and down the stairs. Willie stays in the apartment. Suddenly, the doorbell RINGS. Willie rushes over and opens the door a crack. There is no one there. Confused, he backs away. The doorbell rings again. Completely mystified, he aims his gun and opens the door all the way. The hallway is empty. As Willie stands there, wondering what is happening, Sam steps inside and pushes the door closed. It slams shut. Willie nearly jumps out of his skin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He stares at the door in total bewilderment. At that instant, a collection of picture frames flies off the breakfront and crashes into his legs. He backs away, spooked. Suddenly, the T.V. flicks ON at full volume and then the STEREO and the RADIO. Lights begin flashing on and off. Willie spins around in total dismay. Summoning all of his force, Sam slams into Willie. Willie recoils in unexplainable pain. He seems very disoriented. His gun falls to the floor. He reaches for it and Sam pushes it away. Willie jumps up, afraid. His eyes dart around the room. Sam laughs.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Damn!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Who's there? Who's doing that?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A pair of candle holders shoot off the mantle piece and nearly hit Willie in the head. He freaks. Grabbing his gun, Willie runs into the bathroom and locks the door. Suddenly the hot water faucet turns on by itself. Willie is terrified. Steam rises from the sink. Willie tries to get out, but Sam approaches him from behind and appears to dig his hands into his neck. Willie crumples to his knees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a SQUEAKING SOUND and Willie looks up. Letters are appearing in the fogged mirror. He stares in disbelief as the word "B-O-O!" emerges before him. He cries out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shaking uncontrollably, Willie FIRES his gun at the mirror. Glass and tiles EXPLODE. Willie is cut and bleeding. He grabs hold of the door and yanks it open.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oh God!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Let me outta here!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Willie rushes to the hallway, charges for the back stairs and stumbles down the three flights to the street. Carl, running down the corridor, rushes after him. Willie drops his gun. Carl picks it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . BROOKLYN STREET -- NIGHT Willie runs from the building and careens down the sidewalk. People clear a path as he hurls past them like a madman. Carl, confused, runs after him. Sam, too, races after Willie, unwilling to let him get away. Suddenly, a man obstructs his way. Willie goes flying over him and lands face down on the cement. Before he can get up, Sam is all over him and does not let up. People stand back to watch as Willie does battle with himself. Panicked, he calls out to a bystander.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People back away. Carl watches in terror. He understands exactly what is happening.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Help me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Willie, blinded by his own hysteria, runs wildly into the street. Cars are bearing down on him from all directions. He does not get out of their way. One driver sees Willie coming and swerves to avoid him. His car skids. Another car brakes to avoid a collision and suddenly both cars crash right into him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Willie's body is crushed instantly between the two vehicles as his spirit is catapulted into the air still screaming and writhing. His ghostly form reaches out to people for help as they rush past. No one stops. Willie spins around and sees a mangled body crumpled on the street. Suddenly, he recognizes that it is his own dead body lying there. He begins to scream. A bizarre and frightening CLICKING SOUND fills the air. Sam looks up. A group of strange dark figures has emerged from the shadows. With a loud, terrifying shriek, the dark forms swoop down and grab hold of Willie. Sam freezes. In an instant they are dragging Willie, kicking and screaming, down through the sewer grates into the bowels of the earth.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Look out!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sam backs against a wall in absolute horror. Carl, standing in the crowd, turns and runs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae and her sisters are huddling with the old woman in the entryway to her apartment. They all appear frightened. The door is opened a crack and they can see people gathering in the hall outside. Sam walks up to Oda Mae. She feels his presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae freezes. She turns to Sam.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sam? What happened?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He's dead, Oda Mae.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Dead! (she utters a sigh of relief) Oh, thank God. It's over.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No. It's not over, Oda Mae. There's still Carl.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Who's Carl?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sam and Oda Mae are in a taxi speeding downtown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam leans forward and pushes at the gas pedal. The cab shoots forward. The driver seems shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He gives her a dirty look.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Tell him to hurry!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Can't you hurry up?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Listen, lady, I'm going as fast as I can.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Problems?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: There is a KNOCK at the door. Molly goes to it. Fastening the latch, she opens it a crack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae wedges her foot inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly tries to slam the door but hits Oda Mae's foot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see Sam's inside the room with Molly. He gazes at her lovingly for a moment and then calls back to Oda Mae.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Carl, is that you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Molly, it's Oda Mae. I know what you think of me, but your life is in danger. You have to listen to me. Sam's here, too. You gotta let us in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get the hell out of here. I'm calling the police.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go ahead. We want you to call 'em. You're in trouble. Let us in.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sam's death was no accident. He was murdered, Molly. Carl was laundering money at the bank. Sam found out. He's dangerous. He tried to kill me. He'll kill you, too.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (screaming) Why are you doing this to me? Get away from me! I know all about you. You're a fake. You're just a fake. Leave me alone!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tell her she's wearing the blouse I spilled the Margarita on and the earrings I gave her for Christmas.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sam says you're wearin' the blouse he spilled the Margarita on and the earrings he gave you at Christmas.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: grabbing hold of her beads. Her hand is shaking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae obeys. A pile of coins falls on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae obeys and a penny slides into the loft. Molly sees it. Sam tips it carefully so it lands upright against the bottom of the door. Pushing gently, he moves the penny up the door until it's eye level with Molly. She watches it, amazed. Then, to her astonishment, the penny floats away from the door and hovers in the air. There is a look of wonder in Molly's eyes as it floats toward her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly stands there dumbfounded. Her face is completely white. After a moment she reaches for the penny. It falls into her hand. There are tears in her eyes.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) (continuing) See, I'm no fake.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Go away!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Gimme a penny quick.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Empty your purse. On the floor. Now.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Push a penny under the door.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing; calling to Oda Mae) Tell her it's for luck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Sam says it's for luck.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae standing in the hallway as the door to the loft begins to open. Slowly Molly steps out onto the landing and stares at her, nervously, uncomprehendingly. She hesitates for a long moment and then invites Oda Mae in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly is on the phone. Oda Mae is beside her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae takes her and leads her to the couch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a period of awkward silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly reaches out tentatively. Sam meets her hand. She flinches for a second but does not pull back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae looks away uncomfortably. The CAMERA HOLDS on her face. After a moment she turns around and addresses the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam looks oddly at Oda Mae.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly he understands what she means.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Right. Yes, it's right on the corner. We're a red brick building with the entrance on the left side. Please hurry. Thank you Sergeant. We'll be waiting right here. (she hangs up) Police are on their way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What do we do now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Just wait.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Is Sam here?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'm sitting beside you.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (pointing) Right here.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (fingering the air) Can you feel me, Sam?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: With all my heart.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: With all his heart, he says.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I'd give anything to be alive again, just to feel you once more.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: He wishes he could touch you, just one more time.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Oh, Sam.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Okay, damn it, you can use me if you want.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Come on. Before I change my mind.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sam's finger presses down two keys. We see a record slide out of its slot and move toward the turntable. We know what it is going to play.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae closes her eyes. "Unchained Melody" begins to play. Sam hesitates for a moment and then cautiously, awkwardly slides his ghostly body into her solid form. We sense Oda Mae's discomfort gradually give way as Sam emerges inside her. After a second her body turns slowly toward Molly. Oda Mae's hand reaches out and with slow, deliberate gestures, touches Molly's hand. Molly swallows hard. She closes her eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam. It is as though he alone is there with Molly. His eyes are full of tears. He can barely move. His hand glides slowly down Molly's cheek. He seems to be in a state of ecstasy and pain. The experience is more than he can bear. He pulls back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly reaches out, takes Sam's hand, and guides it to her soft lips. Sam can barely breathe. He seems totally absorbed in the experience, the sensation of human flesh. His eyes are absolutely still and full of light. He seems to be glowing. Gently, Molly takes Sam's arm and guides him to his feet. Effortlessly, she draws him to the center of the huge loft. With great tenderness, she puts her arms around him and before he knows what is happening, they are dancing. It is a strange, touching image, reminiscent of their first night in their new home. Sam reaches out and slowly draws his fingers down over her face, caressing her forehead, her cheeks, her lips. She stands motionless. Her face shines. She knows beyond all doubt that it is him.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Sam!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I love you so much.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A LOUD JARRING SOUND. It takes a moment to realize that it is someone KNOCKING at the door. The light slams back into its shadowy substance and Sam comes shooting back into his ghostly form. Oda Mae is standing with Molly in the center of the room. Sam is beside them. He appears shaken and dizzy. There is a another loud POUNDING at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly heads for the door. Sam calls out. He can barely speak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sam tries to go instead. To his amazement and ours he is extremely weak, barely able to move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His ghostly functions are diminishing. There is another KNOCK and a voice rings out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae grabs Molly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae and Molly run for the fire escape window. We hear Carl yelling in the hallway.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: The police!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to Molly) Wait!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What's happening to me?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Molly, open up. It's me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: It's Carl!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Get out of here! The fire escape.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Come with me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (O.S.) Molly. Open up. Are you there?
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Carl is standing on the landing. He is holding a gun. He aims it at the lock and FIRES. The door to the loft flies open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carl moves rapidly through the huge space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is obvious that no one's home.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Molly!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Sam, with great effort, rushes at Carl and attacks him with his fists. To his great shock, he has no impact. Carl walks right through him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly and Oda Mae are climbing the fire escape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carl runs to the fire escape window. He looks out just in time to see Oda Mae go into the 7th story window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly and Oda Mae run through a new loft that is under construction. It is a maze of tangled wires and broken walls. The fire escape window slams shut and nearly scares them half to death. They rush blindly toward the front door. It won't open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae reaches the fire escape window just as Carl appears on the other side. She screams. Carl tries shoving the window open. It won't budge. Molly sees some scaffolding leading to the skylight. There is an opening at the top.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly quickly climbs the scaffolding and makes it to the roof. With a huge shove, Carl opens the window and rushes inside. The window slams behind him. Oda Mae rushes back toward Molly, but her foot catches on a loose cable and she falls to the ground.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Back to the fire escape. Head for the roof.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: This way!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Help us, Sam!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A hand falls on Oda Mae's shoulder. She spins around. Carl is standing behind her. She screams as he knocks her to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Molly looks down from the scaffolding and begins to scream.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She descends quickly and runs toward Carl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carl kicks Oda Mae. Molly rushes at him, attacking him violently. Carl aims his gun at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He grabs Oda Mae by the hair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oda Mae cries out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She points across the room. Carl sees the purse and yanks Oda Mae toward it. Yanking it off the floor, he tears through it like a wild man. There is no check. He grabs Oda Mae.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He aims his gun at her eye and is about to FIRE when, suddenly, something shoves him to the floor. Carl screams and jumps back, tripping over Oda Mae. Sam is standing there. In total panic, Carl scrambles to get up. Horrified, he SHOOTS his gun blindly into the air. Molly and Oda Mae dive for cover. The bullets have no impact. Sam musters all his strength and shoves Carl again. White with fear, Carl grabs Molly and aims his gun at her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The gun is cocked at her temple. No one moves. Slowly the camera dollies toward Carl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing happens. Carl looks nervous.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I want the check. Just give me the check.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (screaming) God almighty, Carl! What are you doing? What have you done!?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Don't interfere! She's a thief. It's not her money.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Keep out of this, Molly!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Where is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: In my purse.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Over there.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Where is it, goddamn it? Where is it?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: I gave it away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: You're lying! Don't lie to me!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) I'll kill her. You touch me and I'll kill her. I mean it, Sam. Just give me the check.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (continuing) Sam, please. I didn't mean for him to kill you. It's not my fault. Come on, Sam, give me the check. Give it to me and I'll leave her alone.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: CARL Sam? Sam? In a wild explosive fury, Sam charges at Carl and smashes at his gun. The weapon flies out of Carl's hand. Empowered by an anger we have not seen before, Sam smashes into Carl with a violent force. Carl's body careens into walls and floorboards. Wiring snaps. Two-by-fours crack. Carl, crawling desperately to escape, sees his gun on the floor. With a wild rush, he grabs for it and shoots at the door. The lock explodes and the door flies open. Carl tries to run for it, but Sam cuts in front of him. With growing power, Sam sends Carl flying back into the apartment, colliding into a tall scaffold. Bags of plaster topple to the ground as mounds of plaster dust hurl into the air. The apartment looks like a scene from another world. Carl, in a state of total unrelieved panic, breaks away from Sam. The dust obscures his escape. Like a trapped insect, he scrambles furiously to the fire escape window. Sam cannot see him. Carl shoves at the window. It is stuck. With a supreme effort, he grabs a ripped bag of plaster and swings it at the glass. Half of its plaster spews across the room before smashing the window. Shards of glass fly in all directions. Sam turns and sees Carl. He surges after him, but knows he cannot get to him in time. Carl is halfway out the window when Sam's fist slams into an electrical box attached to a dangling BX cable. It goes flying toward the window. To his amazement, it hits the frame. A huge pane of glass dislodges and comes crashing down. Carl looks up just in time to see the pointed edge aiming for his chest. Before he can move, it pierces him between the ribs and slices into his heart. His body quivers. Carl's eyes bulge from their sockets. His body begins to spasm. He can't get up. A look of abject terror flashes through his eyes. He tries to scream. There is no sound. He tries to breathe. There is no breath.
direction.name: direction
